title: Secure Single-Page Apps With Cookies and Token Handlers
author: Jonas Iggbom
description: The token handler pattern resolves multiple SPA vulnerabilities by combining the convenience of sessions and cookies with the strength of access tokens.
cntitle: 使用 Cookie 和 Token 处理程序保护单页应用程序
cndescription: 令牌处理程序模式通过将会话和 Cookie 的便利性与访问令牌的强度相结合，解决了多个 SPA 漏洞。
